import { Dialog, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react' import modals from '../../utils/modals' import { modalClose } from "../../utils/utils" function Modal({ name, data }) { const currentModal = modals.find(m => m.name === name) const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(true) const closeModal = () => { setIsOpen(false) setTimeout(() => { modalClose() }, 200) } return (
{name === "add-note-modal" && }
) } export default Modal
